TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Fonts extends System.Object
public ref class Fonts abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides enumeration support for and objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Uma família de fontes é um conjunto de fontes que têm o mesmo tipo, como Arial, mas que diferem em recursos. Essas diferenças incluem <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Style%2A>, como itálico, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.Typeface.Weight%2A>, como negrito.
![Fontes](~/add/media/fonts.PNG "fontes") Exemplo de tipos que são membros de família de fonte "Times New Roman"

Docs.summary: Returns the collection of objects from a specified font location.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> GetFontFamilies(string location) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFontFamilies (location As String) As ICollection(Of FontFamily)

Docs.param: The location that contains the fonts.
Docs.summary: Returns the collection of objects from a string value that represents the location of the fonts.
Docs.returns: An of objects that represent the fonts in .

remarks.format:

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> GetFontFamilies(class System.Uri baseUri, string location) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetFontFamilies (baseUri As Uri, location As String) As ICollection(Of FontFamily)
public: static System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^> ^ GetFontFamilies(Uri ^ baseUri, System::String ^ location);

Docs.param: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] value of the location of the fonts.
The location that contains the fonts.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of objects using a base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] value to resolve the font location.
Docs.returns: An of objects that represent the fonts in the resolved font location.

remarks.format:
## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar esse método para retornar a coleção de <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily> objetos do local fonte resolvido. Nesse caso, o aplicativo contém um subdiretório chamado "recursos".
[!code-csharp[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/FontFamilySnippets.xaml.cs#fontssnippet3)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#FontsSnippet3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/fontfamilysnippets.xaml.vb#fontssnippet3)]

Docs.summary: Returns the collection of objects from a specified directory location.
